overview: A romantic story of young love is not what it seems.  Rachel meets Matt on his way home from school.  Matt falls for her, but Rachel has other ideas.  Rachel and her boyfriend Nick use Matt to exact a revenge on his parents.  What follows is an escalating story of revenge and payback: amoral teenager versus family.

production_companies.name: New South Wales Film & Television Office

tagline: Welcome to the dark corner of the human heart.
title: Envy
